price: Nãmõminsu bã za su sãmi Allah ba haka jinainansu amma taƙawa daga gare ku tanã, sãmun Sa. Kamar haka Ya hõre su sabõda ku dõmin ku girmama Allah sabõda shiriyar da Ya yi muku. Kuma ka yi bushãra ga mãsu kyautata yi.
arabic: لَن يَنَالَ ٱللَّهَ لُحُومُهَا وَلَا دِمَآؤُهَا وَلَٰكِن يَنَالُهُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ مِنكُمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرَهَا لَكُمۡ لِتُكَبِّرُواْ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَىٰكُمۡۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lan yanāla al-laha luḥūmuhā walā dimāuhā walākin yanāluhu al-taqwā minkum kadhālika sakharahā lakum litukabbirū al-laha ʿalā mā hadākum wabashiri al-muḥ'sinīna
